cta.headline: Want to schedule robotic work for your pipelines?

clients.title: We successfully cooperate with companies worldwide

items.quote: JettyRobot is our regular supplier for robotic cleaning and inspection. We value their precision and safety, adherence to planned downtime, and the ability to deliver a turnkey solution. Robotic dry blasting is a safe and effective method that also protects the pipe surface.
items.author: Bohumil Kratochvil

items.quote: JettyRobot was contracted to clean four pipelines on the South Stream - WP 5.1 Landfall Facility Russia project. The JettyRobot team did an excellent job and also successfully managed the development of the efficient technology required for the project. We look forward to further future cooperation.
items.author: Giuseppe Minnetti

items.quote: JettyRobot carried out the project to a high standard. First of all, I appreciated the professional approach of their implementation team in combination with robotic technology, thanks to which the work was completed in full and before the deadline. Robotic applications are the future for work in the pipeline.
items.author: Toni Rudolph
